segments.text: Do you plan to further your study ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes , I have been always learning the Economics on my own . My dream is to get a master's degree in Economics .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: If you make every effort to the company , you will have a great chance to attend the on-the-job postgraduate . The tuition fee will be financed by our company .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Really ? It is amazing . I will apply for a position in your company .
segments.speaker: S2
